DOC.brief_title: Steroid Withdrawal Immunosuppression After Renal Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Those patient fulfill entry criterion enter prospective control trial steroid withdrawal start three month transplantation . The entry criterion include 1 ) episode clinically treat biopsy confirm acute rejection entry ; 2 ) serum creatinine level equal le 2 mg/mL three separate measurement ; 3 ) proteinuria ( urine protein less 1000 mg/24 hour ; 4 ) tacrolimus trough level > 5 ng/ml without sign nephrotoxicity ; 5 ) agreement follow study protocol . For patient enter protocol , prednisolone would slowly withdrawn 2.5 mg every two week 8 week enter protocol ( 5 month post-transplantation ) . The patient visit every week , closely monitor symptom sign , blood cell count , chemistry , urinalysis .
